title: Život
content:
Život (sometimes referred to as "hit points"), indicated by the red bar, drops as damage is incurred. Život je zaznamenávána spolu dalšími důležitými ukazateli v levém horním rohu obrazovky. If the red bar reaches zero, Geralt dies. A grey screen and (very) audible heart beats warn you of dangerously low vitality. Recover by meditating or drinking potions like the Vlaštovka.

developing Síla is paramount here
Vlaštovka accelerates its regeneration
Lektvar Raffarda Bílého gives an instant boost, but is highly toxic
Jídlo provides 9 minutes of vitality regeneration each time an item is consumed
